initialProofState:

    (hv : CauchySeq fun n => ‚àè k ‚àà range (n + 1), v k) :

  let d : ‚Ñï ‚Üí E := fun n => ‚àè k ‚àà range (n + 1), u k / v k

      by ext n; simp [d]]

  intro n hn

  intro m hm
